Package pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.account.controller

Class AdminAccountManagementController

java.lang.Object
pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.account.controller.AdminAccountManagementController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminAccountManagementController extends Object
Admin-accessible controller providing the user management functionality.
